sentences: Pilv läheb varsti päikese eest ära.
context: The Estonian word 'kadus' is the past tense form of the verb 'kada'. It means to leave, disappear, or go away. From the dictionary definitions, it can be used about people leaving a place (like home or work), or things disappearing or going out of existence. For example: 'Kodunt, töölt ära minema' means to leave from home/work; 'Pilv läheb varsti päikese eest ära' means the cloud will soon disappear from in front of the sun; 'Isa läks päris tujust ära' means father completely disappeared/gone away.
